inclusion.criterion: Patients attending a rehabilitation program in the Rehabilitation Hospital Revarte, Belgium
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Neurological, except stroke, and orthopaedic impairments influencing outcome measures
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pre-existing co-morbid conditions that may affect vision and somatosensory function
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of tremors since a year ago, with jaundice, hepatosplenomegaly and hypotonia. Wilson disease was confirmed by high liver copper concentration.
